question: The India State of Forest Report (ISFR) 2015 states that the majority of the increase in forest cover has been observed in:
explanation: The India State of Forest Report (ISFR) 2015 states that the majority of the increase in forest cover has been observed in open forest category, followed by Very Dense Forest. While Open Forest area has increased by 9.14 per cent of the geographical area, the area under Very Dense Forest increased by 2.61% of the geographical area.
